description:
SAP MDG training is relevant for a wide audience with a variety of background: Functional Experts, ABAP developers, Data Experts, Implementation Leads. Specifically BRFPlus, Workflow and WebDynpro ABAP developers play a crucial part in any MDG implementation.

SAP MDG is a rapidly growing product offering. Master Data and its relevance to business process and analytics has been long ignored by organizations.

This training is created by SAP MDG experts with several implementation projects in a variety of scenarios. Learn MDG effectively in the shortest possible time. This is not merely a how-to guide. It give you an end-to-end view of MDG implementation.

The MDG training includes a MDG demo and detailed overview of MDG Architecture. MDG uses several technical components in the underlying ECC system. Several session to dedicated to cover each technical component: WebDynpro for ABAP, ABAP Dictionary, Business Workflow.

The course includes detailed demos. We pause at various times in the demo to explain the underlying concepts.

The course has been designed by Indira Sharma, Abhi Anantharam and Velu Singa. You will hear the voice of Velu all through this training session.
title: Learn SAP MDG from Master Data Experts
